sfField.formula: IF( All_Products_Configured__c = FALSE,'Items Pending Configuration',\n HYPERLINK("/apex/runOrderDDP?Id="&Id& "&hideddp=true&ddpIds=a1iE0000001Vusc&deploy=a1hE0000000CGSY"\n,"Generate"))

IF( All_Products_Configured__c = FALSE,'Items Pending Configuration', \nHYPERLINK("/apex/echosign_dev1__AgreementTemplateProcess?masterId="&Id&"&templateId=a0vE0000006uxki"&"&accountId="& Account_ID__c, "Send"))

sfField.summary: This will indicate, via rollup summary, the number of packages (order lines) that have been configured, based on the sales agents' manual indication as such.
This will indicate, via rollup summary, the number of packages (order lines) that are related to this order.
